name: A Forklift Game
description:
A Forklift Game

Your mission is simple. Drive. Lift. And try not to mess up! In this forklifting game you will experience an excitement that everyone that has ever worked in a warehouse have wanted to experience. The game uses the powerful physics engine of Unity to give you a happy run around in this warehouse filled with “A lot of” things to destroy. Enjoy this simple game to release some steam. Or just get the feeling of destruction when you feel like it. Happy forking everybody!

How to play: Use the W A S D buttons or the arrow keys to drive. Raise and lower the forks with “Q” and “E”. And the best of all, you can also honk with mouse click or space bar.

Credits: (Link goes to their Itch.io user)
